freqshow\_code package
======================

Code from Adafruit's [FreqShow] (https://github.com/adafruit/FreqShow) project. Used for the Software Defined Radio (SDR) function. Find the  `code`_

.. _code: https://github.com/adafruit/FreqShow


View the [source code](https://github.com/poliastro/poliastro) of poliastro!


.. automodule:: freqshow_code
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
